author: BBC Sport
description: Sunderland will only consider offers of about £30m for goalkeeper Jordan Pickford, says boss David Moyes.
title: Jordan Pickford: Sunderland will demand £30m for keeper - David Moyes

author: FourFourTwo
description: Arsenal boss Arsene Wenger has ruled out a move for Sunderland number one Jordan Pickford ahead of next season.
title: Arsene Wenger rules out Arsenal swoop for Jordan Pickford

author: talkSPORT
description: Jose Mourinho has changed from a charismatic guy to ‘very dour’ since taking charge of Manchester United. This is the view of former Crystal Palace chairman Simon Jordan, who was speaking to the Alan Brazil Sports Breakfast. Appointed in the summer to replace Louis van Gaal, Mourinho has never recaptured the early spirit that was associated with him when in his first spell in charge of Chelsea over a decade ago.
title: The pressure of the Manchester United job has changed Jose Mourinho, Simon Jordan tells talkSPORT

author: FourFourTwo
description: Jordan Pickford is expected to be one of the in-demand players of the transfer window, with David Moyes suggesting he is worth £30million.
title: I have heard some derisory figures - Moyes believes Pickford is worth £30m

author: Scarlet Howes
description: Katie Britton-Jordan, 38, was diagnosed with stage 2a triple negative breast cancer last year after discovering a lump as a result of breastfeeding
title: Mum with breast cancer turns down NHS treatment in favour of unusual alternative

author: BBC Sport
description: Jordan Nobbs equalises deep into injury time for Arsenal as they draw 2-2 away against Chelsea in the Women's Super League One Spring Series.
title: Women's Super League One: Chelsea 2-2 Arsenal highlights

author: Al Jazeera
description: Officials say air strike targeted fighters near At Tanf who posed a threat to US-backed forces near the Jordan border.
title: US-led coalition hits pro-Assad fighters' convoy

author: Maria Abi-Habib
description: The U.S.-led military coalition in Syria launched airstrikes on Syrian regime forces as they approached U.S.-backed rebels in al-Tanf, on the border with Jordan.
title: U.S. Strikes Advancing Syrian-Led Troops

author: BBC Sport
description: Harry Kane or Diego Costa up front? Jordan Pickford or Tom Heaton in goal? Create your own XI from this season's best players.
title: Premier League team of the season: Harry Kane? Diego Costa? Choose your XI

author: JUSTIN JUOZAPAVICIUS
description: TULSA, Okla. (AP) — A white Oklahoma police officer acquitted in an unarmed black man's shooting death will be back on the force next week, even as jurors who declared her not guilty of manslaughter unanimously agreed she should never return to patrol. Tulsa police Chief Chuck Jordan issued a one-sentence statement Friday in which he said Betty Jo Shelby is reinstated. It comes a day after black community leaders rallied, urging city leaders to block the 43-year-old officer from getting back her job. She had been on unpaid leave since Sept. 22 when she was charged in the death.
title: Tulsa officer acquitted in man's death returning to force
